mapper.select: SELECT id, emp_name, PASSWORD, idcard, sax, phone, address, entry_time, leave_time, del_flag FROM sys_employee WHERE emp_name CONCAT('%',#{findContent},'%') OR phone CONCAT('%',#{findContent},'%') AND del_flag = 0

SELECT permission FROM sys_employee e, sys_emp_role er, sys_role r, sys_role_menu rm, sys_menu m WHERE e.id = er.emp_id AND er.role_id = r.id AND rm.menu_id = m.id AND e.del_flag = 0 AND er.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 AND e.emp_name = #{empName} GROUP BY permission
SELECT e.id, e.emp_name, e.phone FROM sys_employee e, sys_emp_role er, sys_role r WHERE e.id = er.emp_id AND er.role_id = r.id AND r.role_name = '配送员' AND er.del_flag = 0 AND e.del_flag = 0
